page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: From our survey (of families with at least one child aged 8-11) it would seem that almost every household has one person in{full employment.}Over half of our sample had two or more adults employed, but in many cases the mother worked part-time. Occupations listed were generally{skilled}or {professional. Many people worked locally in Brentwood or other parts of south Essex and used a{car}to travel to work. About half of our sample worked in London and drove to the station in Brentwood to catch a{train}into Liverpool St. Station; some continued their journey by underground. For a few, travelling extensively is part of their job, while some work near enough to home to{cycle}or{walk}to their place of employment.
